Html:
I know that Oxite isn't being actively developed any longer with most of the staff moving to the Orchard project instead but I was just wondering if it's still possible for us to work on it if we choose to.

And if it is, how would one go about it?

You can do whatever you want with it.  Grab the source and go to town.  If you're asking if there's a way to work on the source code here on CodePlex and check-in new code, no.  Since it's not being further developed, we are not taking new contributors.
